Detailed Description

This class is a one-per-chunk cache of the chunk terrain item for that chunk (if it has one).

It allows easy access to the terrain block given the chunk, and adds the terrain obstacle.

Member Function Documentation

int ChunkTerrainCache::focus (  )  [virtual]

This method is called when our chunk is focussed.

We add ourselves to the chunk space's obstacles at that point.

Reimplemented from ChunkCache.
